/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
		// your code goes here
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int t = sc.nextInt();
		while(t-->0){
		    int m=sc.nextInt();
		    int n=sc.nextInt();
		    int[][] arr=new int[m][n];
		    for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		        for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		            arr[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
		    }
		    int max=(-4000005);
		    for(int k=1;k<m;k++){
		        for(int i=0;i<m-k;i++){
		            for(int j=0;j<n-k;j++){
		                int sum = totalweight(arr,k,i,j);
		                if(max<sum)
		                    max=sum;
		            }
		        }
		    }
		    System.out.println(max);
		}
		sc.close();
	}
	public static int totalweight(int arr[][],int k,int i,int j){
	    int x=i,y=j,sum=0;
	    for(int t=0;t<=k;t++){
	        sum+=arr[x+t][y+t];
	        sum+=arr[x+t][y+k-t];
	    }
	    if(k%2==0)
	        sum-=arr[x+(k/2)][y+(k/2)];
	    return sum;
	}
}
